content.p: The Planning, Performance and Strategic Change (PPSC) Directorate enables the University to deliver its strategy, performance objectives, plans, projects and statutory requirements. We inject energy, pace and leadership to facilitate effective decision making and deliver change. By providing clear data, insight, governance and frameworks we ensure that the University invests in and successfully delivers initiatives and activities which will deliver its vision and strategic outcomes. By maintaining a holistic view of strategy, plans, data and projects we are able to bring people together from across the institution; building connections and reducing silos. The directorate is made up of three functions:
